for _ in xrange(input()):
    a=list(raw_input().strip())
    b=sorted(set(a))
    c=[]
    s=0
    for i in b:
        count=0
        for j in a:
            if j==i:
                count=count+1
                
        c.append(count)

    
    for i in range(len(c)):
        if c[i]==1:
            s=s+1
        elif c[i]%2==0:
            s=s+(c[i]/2)
        elif c[i]%2!=0:
            s=s+(c[i]+1)/2

    print s
